history.user: My internet is very slow today
history.bot: I see you have a internet_issue issue. Internet problems are the worst — I'm here to help. Is this affecting all devices or just some? And could you check what the internet/power lights look like on your modem?

history.user: It's not connecting at all now
history.bot: I know how annoying unstable internet can be. Let's fix this fast — are you on Wi-Fi or wired connection, and what status lights are showing on your modem/router at the moment?

history.user: Also, I can't check my balance
history.bot: I see you have a balance_inquiry issue. Happy to check your balance right away! Which number or service would you like me to look up for you?
